title: In Mexico City, a Private Art Collection Evolves into a Public Museum
description: One of the world’s richest men says he hopes his extensive collection can be a gift to his country long after he is gone.
dc:creator: Ray Mark Rinaldi
media:credit: Jackie Russo for The New York Times
media:description: Museo Kaluz, housed in an 18th-century building, is one of Mexico City’s few privately run museums.
